decks.notes: The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven for consistent damage, along with strong creatures like Ygra, Eater of All and Gilded Goose for added versatility, the deck aims to control the battlefield and outpace the opponent. Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER and Al Bhed Salvagers provide additional threats and value, while cards like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay help deal with opposing threats efficiently. The deck also includes some card advantage and ramp options to ensure a smooth and aggressive gameplay.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively attack your opponent using a combination of creatures and removal spells. Utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt your opponent's hand while deploying threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Blightstep Pathway to pressure their life total. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to close out games. By maintaining a fast and aggressive game plan, this Rakdos Aggro deck aims to overwhelm and outpace the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on using auras to quickly boost creatures and deal damage. By playing aggressive creatures like Gladecover Scout and Saiba Cryptomancer, followed by powerful auras like Staggering Insight and Ethereal Armor, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and consistent damage. The inclusion of protection spells like Sheltered by Ghosts and Kaya's Ghostform help to keep key creatures alive. The deck also utilizes cards like Starting Town and Temple Garden to ensure mana consistency and curve out efficiently. Ultimately, the deck's strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game.

The deck focuses on creating a powerful combo using Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to generate value and overwhelm the opponent. It includes cards like Fleeting Spirit and Seasoned Hallowblade to support the combo and protect key pieces. The use of Monument to Endurance and Sheltered by Ghosts helps to maintain board presence and protect against removal spells. The deck also includes a mix of lands to ensure mana consistency and support the combo strategy effectively.

The deck focuses on creating a fast-paced aggressive strategy by utilizing artifact creatures and enchantments to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By using cards like Ensoul Artifact and Shrapnel Blast, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and direct damage spells. The inclusion of card draw and counterspells helps to maintain a steady flow of threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck includes various utility creatures and artifacts to provide additional support and versatility in different situations.

This deck focuses on quickly sacrificing creatures for value, dealing consistent damage to the opponent by utilizing effects triggered by sacrificing creatures. The key strategy involves using Cauldron Familiar and Mayhem Devil in combination with Witch's Oven to continuously generate damage and control the board. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan and keep the pressure on. The deck aims to close out games quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats and removal.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent and overwhelm them before they have a chance to stabilize. With a combination of efficient creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Sunspine Lynx, along with burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning, the deck can apply constant pressure and finish off opponents with direct damage from cards like Ramunap Ruins and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance. The goal is to win the game quickly and decisively by maintaining a relentless assault on the opponent's life total.
